item.title: Electro-magnetic Pickup (Pickup)
item.dc:creator: PyPHS project
item.description:
Electro-magnetic pickup as found in electric instruments (guitars and piano). See [1] for details.

item.title: Cantilever beam (Cantilever)
item.dc:creator: PyPHS project
item.description:
Euler-Bernouilli cantilever beam as presented in [1] (section 4.2).

Read more… (1 min remaining to read)

item.title: PWL Storage (Storage)
item.dc:creator: PyPHS project
item.description:
Piecewise-linear SISO storage component based on the PWL interpolation proposed in [1], (eq (2), known as the Chua interpolation). The file pointed by file argument should contains two lines, each blank separated list of floats for (x, H) or (x, dxH) values. If (x, dxH) values are provided, the resulting interpolation must be integrated to yield a (x, H) mapping (see integrate parameter below).

Read more… (1 min remaining to read)

item.title: PWL Dissipation (Dissipative)
item.dc:creator: PyPHS project
item.description:
Piecewise-linear SISO dissipative component based on the PWL interpolation proposed in [1], (eq (2), known as the Chua interpolation). The file pointed by file argument should contains two lines, each blank separated list of floats for (x, y) values.

Read more… (1 min remaining to read)

item.title: Flux-controlled fractional integrator (Fracintfc)
item.dc:creator: PyPHS project
item.description:
Flux-controlled fractional integrator from [1] (chap 7)

\begin{equation*} e(s) = g \, s^{-beta} \, f(s). \end{equation*}

Read more… (1 min remaining to read)

item.title: Effort-controlled fractional integrator (Fracintec)
item.dc:creator: PyPHS project
item.description:
Effort-controlled fractional integrator from [1] (chap 7):

\begin{equation*} f(s) = g \, s^{-beta} \, e(s). \end{equation*}

Read more… (1 min remaining to read)

item.title: Flux-controlled fractional derivator (Fracderfc)
item.dc:creator: PyPHS project
item.description:
Flux-controlled fractional derivator from [1] (chap 7):

\begin{equation*} e(s) = g \, s^{alpha} \, f(s). \end{equation*}

item.title: Effort-controlled fractional derivator (Fracderec)
item.dc:creator: PyPHS project
item.description:
Effort-controlled fractional derivator from [1] (chap 7):

\begin{equation*} f(s) = g \, s^{alpha} \, e(s). \end{equation*}

item.title: Transformer
item.dc:creator: PyPHS project
item.description:
Quadripole connector of transformer type with:

\begin{equation*} \left\{\begin{array}{rcl} f_A &=& -\alpha\, f_B, \\ e_B &=& + \alpha\,e_A. \end{array}\right. \end{equation*}

Read more… (1 min remaining to read)

item.title: Gyrator
item.dc:creator: PyPHS project
item.description:
Quadripole connector of gyrator type with:

\begin{equation*} \left\{\begin{array}{rcl} e_A &=& -\alpha\,f_B, \\ e_B &=& + \alpha\,f_A. \end{array}\right. \end{equation*}
